QuestData.Title: Lightly Roasted
QuestData.Description: Can you hear me, $n? Good.$b$bLight's Judgment has been installed on the Vindicaar. We should be able to harness its power immediately.$b$bWe can use it both to clear the rubble blocking the Xenedar as well as destroy our enemies.$b$bAs with any new piece of technology, we should test it out. Thoroughly. I trust you have plenty of targets down there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Light's Judgment to destroy the rubble blocking the entrance to the Xenedar.
